metadata.title: CVE-2024-33918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-siteScripting') vulnerability in Maxim K AJAX Login and Registration modalpopup + inline form allows Stored XSS.This issue affects AJAX Login andRegistration modal popup + inline form: from n/a through 2.23.

criterions.comment: form package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
